task_description:
# Access Request Workflow

Implement workflow system for access requests that integrates with the existing job role compliance matrix. Employees or managers can request access, requests route to appropriate approvers, and approval/denial is tracked.

## Rationale
Manual access provisioning is slow and lacks audit trail. Workflow automation reduces time-to-access while maintaining compliance controls. This addresses the 'no workflow automation' known gap and provides value beyond simple lookup - moving toward lightweight IAM functionality.

## User Stories
- As an employee, I want to request access through WhoDis so that I don't have to email IT
- As a manager, I want to approve team access requests so that provisioning is faster

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Access request form accessible from self-service portal
- [ ] Request types: AD group, Genesys skill/queue, Generic access request
- [ ] Approval routing based on configurable rules (manager, role owner, security)
- [ ] Multi-level approval support for sensitive access
- [ ] Email notifications at each workflow step
- [ ] Request status tracking visible to requester and approvers
- [ ] Completed requests logged in audit trail with full approval chain
- [ ] Integration with job role compliance to flag requests outside expected roles
